scripts.build: npm run dist:init && webpack --progress --profile --colors --display-error-details && npm run assets
scripts.dist:init: npm run clean:dist shx mkdir -p dist/css && shx mkdir -p dist/fonts && shx mkdir -p dist/js && shx mkdir -p dist/img
scripts.clean: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:dist
scripts.assets: npm run css && npm run php && npm run screenshot
scripts.css: npm run css:vendor && npm run css:custom && npm run css:compress
scripts.css:compress: shx mkdir -p dist/css && uglifycss --output dist/css/vendor.min.css build/vendor.css && uglifycss --output dist/css/style.min.css build/style.css
